item.title: Hey, I need that
item.dc:creator: @green_dude green dude
item.description:
@green_dude wrote:

Open your client.JAVA and search for :

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("barrows")

Then add the following code afther the last }

if (command.startsWith("starter")) { if(kitstarter >= 1) PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Tried to cheat - black mark!!!"); BufferedWriter bw = null; try {bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/blackmarks.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" Tried to Cheat, black mark! "); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); blackmark +=1; } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error with black mark logging!"); } } } else if(kitstarter <= 0){ kitstarter +=1; BufferedWriter bw = null; PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " Got their starter kit get your's by typing ::starter"); addItem(ITEMID,ITEMAMMOUNT); try { bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("logs/starters.txt", true)); bw.write(playerName+" Got their starter pack "); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bw != null) try { bw.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) { sendMessage("Error with stater pack logging!"); } } } else if(command.startsWith("scheck")); {sendMessage("You now have "+kitstarter+" starter packs"); } }

Then ABOVE boolean process add this :

public int kitstarter = 0; public int blackmark = 0;

Search for :

characterfile.write("character-lastlogintime = ", 0, 26);

And you should see this :

characterfile.write("character-lastlogintime = ", 0, 26); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(playerLastLogin), 0, Integer.toString(playerLastLogin).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Under it add this :

characterfile.write("character-kitstarter = ", 0, 23); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(kitstarter), 0, Integer.toString(kitstarter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Search for :

} else if (token.equals("character-lastlogintime")) {

You should find this :

} else if (token.equals("character-lastlogintime")) { lastlogintime = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Under it add :

} else if (token.equals("character-kitstarter")) { kitstarter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

Thats all…Long but easy.

~Green Dude~

Read full topic

item.title: Hey, I need that

@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

[code]
boolean started;
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)){
if(started){
sendMessage(“You already got your starter, BITCH.”);
dissconnected = true;
}else{
started = true;
//You already know how to do this part, so I’m leaving it out…
}
}

//some lines down later . …
characterfile.writeLine(started);
…
//etc . . . .[/code]
